Text:
Thank you Claudia.Hope you have a great
weekend
Many thanks once again CZ - The effort that you constantly put into this is just amazing !!! :):):)
@mickeymichael: it's such a pleasure for me to share this with all us soap fans! Thanks to you for being there!!

Thank you for your hard work in keeping these Y&Rs coming to us. You who serve up the videos day in and day out, rain or shine, are true heroines and we all appreciate it. Just know that there are us out here who do not take you for granted.
You're welcome, guys! Your kind words mean a lot to me!
